PSCT.Base: Tribute 1 "Cyber Dragon"; Special Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck that lists a "Cyber Dragon" monster as material, but it cannot attack directly, and is destroyed during the End Phase of the next turn. You can only activate 1 "Cybernetic Revolution" per turn.
